paper_keywords: Lower and upper expectations and probabilities
paper_abstract: This paper presents concentration inequalities and laws of large numbers under weak assumptions of irrelevance that are expressed using lower and upper expectations. The results build upon De Cooman and Miranda's recent inequalities and laws of large numbers. The proofs indicate connections between the theory of martingales and concepts of epistemic and regular irrelevance. (C) 2010 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Concentration inequalities and laws of large numbers under epistemic and regular irrelevance
